In addition to CTC, Congress also expanded the Earned Income Tax Credit for lower wage workers, which helps childless workers plus those with kids. And these credits are fully refundable, meaning if they exceed the taxes you owe you get the rest back as refund.
The new https://t.co/aDPc83cCse website will give you more information about these important programs, as well as direct you to free options to file your return online.
